text.div:
Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    49672-9 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    5035-1 Streptococcus pneumoniae rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    51668-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA and Haemophilus influenza DNA and Pseudomonas aeruginosa DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    53917-1 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    62493-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA and Haemophilus influenza DNA and Streptococcus agalactiae DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    76587-5 Streptococcus pneumoniae nanA gene [#/mass] in XXX.tissue by NAA with probe detection
    76600-6 Streptococcus pneumoniae nanA gene [#/volume] in XXX.body fluid by NAA with probe detection
    82187-6 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    85496-8 Streptococcus pneumoniae serotype [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85688-0 Streptococcus pneumoniae lytA gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    85750-8 Streptococcus pneumoniae Danish serotype 23A DNA [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85751-6 Streptococcus pneumoniae Danish serotype 16F DNA [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
